sarad.data_collector¶

Command line application that gives back the most recent value of a SARAD instrument whenever it is called. Made to be a data source for Zabbix agent.

Module Contents¶

Functions¶

on_connect(client, userdata, flags, result_code)

Will be carried out when the client connected to the MQTT broker.

Will be carried out when the client disconnected

Command line application that gives back the most recent value of a SARAD instrument whenever it is called.

sarad.data_collector.cluster(lock_path)¶

Show list of connected SARAD instruments.

sarad.data_collector.send(target, instrument, component, sensor)¶

Define a function to be executed on scheduled times

sarad.data_collector.set_send_scheduler(target, instrument, component, sensor)¶

Initialise the scheduler to perform the send function.

sarad.data_collector.unwrapped_transmit(**kwargs)¶

General function to transmit all values gathered from the instruments in our cluster to a target. Target can be the output of the command on the command line (screen), an MQTT broker or a Zabbix server.

sarad.data_collector.transmit(**kwargs)¶

General function to transmit all values gathered from the instruments in our cluster to a target. Target can be the output of the command on the command line (screen), an MQTT broker or a Zabbix server.

sarad.data_collector.last_session()¶

Starts the last trapper session as continuous service
